author: The Centerstage Team
title: Spotted: Shilpa Shetty
text:
Shilpa Shetty chose a vibrant yellow shirt and blue jeans for a recent event in town. The casual look was a welcome break from her OTT glamour.

Also spotted 
Nawazuddin Siddiqui has been roped in as the brand ambassador for a suitingsâ€™ line. Ironic, considering he had once famously said he has just one suit which he repeats at events. Pic/Yogen Shah

Vishal Bhardwaj and Kiran Rao were seen engrossed in conversation at a press conference for a film festival.

We wonder what they were discussing that  Kiran was left scratching her head. Pic/Pradeep Dhivar
